title: only mark as read manually
content: At least a year ago when I first installed Thunderbird I set it to only mark my emails as read if I did it manually. Now I decided to turn that off and it looks like the option is gone. Is that option gone? Does anyone know where it's at? I can't believe I can't find it or anyone else talking about it.
creator: ghost2thepost

title: Cannot see my read messages list. Can see only unread messages list.
content: Hello. I cannot see the list of my read messages in inbox folder. I see that I have 1700 messages but I cannot reset the setting to see both the unread and read messages. Thank you for your help.
creator: jm081214
